price: 144. Dan zou hij inderdaad in de buik zijn gebleven tot de Dag der Opstanding.
arabic: لَلَبِثَ فِي بَطۡنِهِۦٓ إِلَىٰ يَوۡمِ يُبۡعَثُونَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: lalabitha fī baṭnihi ilā yawmi yub'ʿathūna
